Package com.eclipsesource.tabris.ui

Interface ActionOperator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionOperatorImpl
    public interface ActionOperator

    The single purpose of the ActionOperator is to modify and get the state of Action objects at runtime. this means you can influence the visibility or the enabled state of an Action.

    Note: This interfaces is still considered provisional. It is expected to evolve over the next releases, which may lead to slight changes. Consider using AbstractAction and it's methods.

    Since:
    1.0
    No Implement:
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean exists​(java.lang.String id)
      Checks if an Action with the specified id exists.
      Action getAction​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the actual Action instance for a given id.
      boolean isActionEnabled​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the enabled state of an Action.
      boolean isActionVisible​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the visibility of an Action.
      void setActionEnabled​(java.lang.String id, boolean enabled)
      Sets the enabled state of an Action.
      void setActionVisible​(java.lang.String id, boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility of an Action.

        void setActionEnabled​(java.lang.String id,
                      boolean enabled)
               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException

        Sets the enabled state of an Action.

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Action. Must not be empty or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when no Action for the given id exist.
